title: Mailto links do not work properly in Firefox
content: As per subject. When i click a Mailto link in a webpage, eMClient opens OK, but message window does not. Seems to be a Firefox problem because it works fine in Chrome. I've checked the Firefox and Windows (10) settings; all seems as it should be. Any suggestions? Thanks.
creator: autolycus1

title: Location Services
content: I live in Indiana but every time I try to access anything location related in firebox it thinks my computer keeps thinking I am in Boydton Virginia. In checked in google chrome and all my location services do work correctly showing correct locations. I have refreshed in Firefox, and I have uninstalled and reinstalled the program.
creator: user43703228666632726937650417870410227427

title: Keyboard Shortcuts Differences Between Windows and Linux
content: I often use Ctrl+Number to jump to a fixed tab, whereas on Linux the shortcut is Alt+Number, which causes some inconveniences. Is it possible to make Firefox use Ctrl+Number to switch tabs on Linux?
creator: dice1101

title: receiving repeated unwanted pop-ups supposedly from at & t, how to stop
content:
receiving repeated unwanted pop-ups supposedly from at & t, how to stop. When tried to cut and paste the pop-up jumped to another screen, but was able to forward sending web address to at & t fraud.

If happens again will update this post with web address.

Not aware of any after marked pop-up blocker installed on my desktop.

Any security setting which can be set in MS to block pop ups?
creator: johnlk99

title: Firefox stops working after working for a while
content: At some point after a Firefox and/or Windows update, Firefox started to stall after working for a while. When I open Firefox, I start surfing using multiple tabs, using bookmarks, typing URLs, or clicking on web links and then suddenly, the little dot in the current tab where I am trying to access another link, starts moving right and left indefinitely, apparently waiting or unable to access the desired page. After that I type well-known URLs (such as google.com) that I know "always" work, and the same thing happens. From then on Firefox cannot access any URL I throw at it (no error messages or warning of any kind) until I close Firefox and reopen. Once I reopen, the cycle repeats: it works for a while until it doesn't. I have cleared all cookies and caches, I have erased or disabled all extensions, but the problems persists. Any advise? Thank you.
creator: butron43

title: Old Firefox Bug has returned in recent update 126.0.1
content:
The first time i enter fullscreen for the on the current monitor, the window is not filled completely. It fixes itself if i exit fullscreen and enter it again.

I did not observe this behaviour in 124.0

this also happened like 1 year ago. i made a comment about this in a bugzilla thread right here: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1763981#c119

The fix mentioned in that thread is applied for me.

It does not fix it.
creator: jan237

title: Closing a tab next to an unloaded one jumps to previous tab
content:
Hi,

If I have an unloaded tab on right of the current tab and I close the current one, instead of going to the right tab, which is the unloaded one, it jumps to another tab which I'm not sure has what relation to it, it certainly is not the tab that opened it.

I removed every modified entry of "Browser.tab" in About:Config, installed "Select After Closing Tab", no result.

Thanks
creator: Silliness7034

title: Firefox Mac Keyboard Won't Work on Some Sites
content:
I can't use Firefox on my Mac with the Reddit.com web site because letters vanish. I started to type "Mac" but aafter the "M" nothing appeared and I got the message "Server Error."

I just had a similar thing happen on the InternetArchive (archive.org).

Chrome and Safari work perfectly.

I've updated Firefox several times with this problem.
creator: eric.weiss

title: internet reduced in firefox
content: My internet has 750mb of bandwidth. Updated 64bit Firefox can only provide 320mb. I installed Chrome and the internet went to 800mb. What could be slowing down internet speed in Firefox? I restored Firefox, restarting everything. I did the same with Windows 10. I restored it to an earlier date. It didn't improve anything. What to do ?
creator: rodrigogpena

title: Downgrade
content: Hoy instalé la última actualización de Firefox y desde entonces nada funciona bien. No puedo hacer click en muchos botones, no puedo seleccionar mis correos individualmente para borrarlos, etc, etc. Quisiera volver a la versión 125 que funcionaba perfectamente. Por favor indiquenme como hacerlo.
creator: Pablitoportela

title: email sign-in
content:
Hi, I would like to remove the hints that appear below the sign-in box for my email account (yahoo). I want to be able to type in my email address each time without being prompted by a hint address (windows 11/firefox browser). Please help me eliminate/delete the addresses that auto-populate the hints email addresses. Thank you.

ps: please note that I do not have an in-depth understanding of computers or computer development language (mostly computer illiterate). I cannot write or change code.
creator: espaulding007

title: Firefox developer edition still crashed
content:
I'm a long time FF user, the developer edition is my preferred browser. It suddenly started crashing, a complete removal and new install did not help.I posted a help question a couple of weeks ago but no workable solution surfaced unfortunately. I assume the problem is still the same.

ps. I'm currently using the standard FF verison and it runs smooth as ever....

creator: rmeijer

title: Self-signed certificates refused
content:
Sinds enige tijd weigert firefox verbinding te maken met hosts met self-signed certificates. Voorheen kon je met de 'Advanced' 'Accept and continue' doorgaan, maar deze optie wordt niet meer geboden. Als ik via een andere browser het certificate download en wil installeren, kan dit niet. Als ik handmatig een uitzondering wil toevoegen met 'Add exception' en dan de uri van de host invoer, gevolgd door 'Get certificate', dan weigert hij deze op te voeren omdat de host 'valid' is en import 'unneeded'. Ergo, linksom of rechtsom, ik kom er niet meer door. Chrome heeft hier geen issues mee.

Graag een oplossing.
creator: barbapappa

title: Constant Crashing Since Update Yesterday
content: Since yesterday, Firefox is crashing constantly. Any action taken on a page can cause it to crash. My cache and cookies have been cleared (every time I end a session), my computer has been restarted (now 20x). I have checked settings on MFF and all looks correct. I have used for years and never had this issue but have been using another browser since yesterday afternoon because this is disruptive to work. Anybody else having issues since the update 5/29/24?
creator: DitaD

title: Firefox showing wrong response time in dev console
content:
Hello! I've been noticing for several versions of Firefox that the response times reported in the “Network” tab of the developer console are wrong. In Chrome it shows the true value, which are a few ms, while in Firefox they show that it takes several seconds!!!! I attach the images of the problem.

Is it a bug, or a configuration problem itself? Thanks in advance

title: FireFox changes
content: When I start FireFox most times the browser comes up then stops and restarts with a pink color on the web address line. I have tried making changes in settings but I can not find a setting for this. If I restart Firefox right after this happens, I cn search or browse without the Pink address line. Why is this happening. It would be nice if FireFox technicians would respond to help questions instead of sending questions to a forem...

title: Cannot move tabs, till Firefox restart
content:
Hi. Randomly, but very often, I cannot drag and drop move tabs. Other moving (p.e. "move to beginning") does work. After restart of Firefox, it works again - till it randomly does not.

Current Firefox (126.0) Kubuntu Installed via Snap
creator: tobiasgriese

title: Error en carga de pestañas
content: En sesiones de Firefox (v. 126-0.1 en Windows 11) con varias pestañas abiertas y funcionales, al ir a abrir una nueva me aparece aleatoriamente un mensaje de error diciendo que no ha podido cargarla (no se ha podido cargar la pestaña). A partir de ahí, esa ventana deja de ser útil. No depende del sitio web al que acceder, porque paso con cualquiera. Si abro una ventana nueva del navegador, funciona sin problemas, pero es lento y engorroso no saber cuándo va a fallarte la carga y tener que recargar toda la sesión previa cada vez. Esto es constante ya desde la versión anterior de Firefox.
creator: josangon1962

title: How to restore firefox settings and bookmarks after Windows corrupted and deleted user profile?
content:
I restarted my Windows 11 laptop and got error message about user profile. Restarted again and looks like it was corrupted so deleted my my user profile and Firefox config and bookmarks are gone!

Still have all the files just a new user profile and the old one is gone?

Any help how to get Firefox bookmarks back would be much appreciated

creator: joviaamira

title: Wrong focus when right-clicking on a bookmark (126.0 for Linux Mint)
content:
Since the latest update, when I right-click on a bookmark or an item in the history list (from the menu or the bookmarks toolbar), I still get the menu that has items like "Open in new tab" or "Edit Bookmark".

However, the focus for the mouse stays on the previous menu, so that I can't click on anything in the "right-click menu", instead it is interpreted as a click in some random item in the previous menu.

Going into troubleshoot mode didn't help, so I don't think it's my configuration causing this.
creator: christinetobler

Is there any better way than adding a bookmark for it?

content: Buongiorno. Con firefox è impossibile accedere all'Hub Wind3 IP :192.168.1.1 per risulterebbe non sicuro. Come posso fare? Grazie MS
creator: martino.steffanoni

title: Nastroje pro webove vyvojare - zobrazovani cisla radku
content:
menu > Nastroje prohlizece > Nastroje pro webove vyvojare V javascriptove konzoli je moznost v nastaveni povolit/zakazat zobrazovani casoveho razitka. Mam zakazane. Ale, hodilo by se mi, kdyby tam slo zapnout/vypnout zobrazovani cisla radku.

Pro ladeni scriptu, treba ja si hraji se serazovacimi algoritmy, vypisuji do konzoly ruzna data, ktera se meni podle cyklu. Najdu si radek, kde se chyba projevi. Pri zmacknuti F5 je to ten samy radek. Jenze ho musim hledat ve vypisu asi 50 dalsich radku :) Cili, cislo radku zustava zachovane.

Samozrejme, u jinych scriptu se to nehodi. Takze by to melo jit vypnout, kdyby to tam nekdo nechtel. Jako, treba, mne je k nicemu to casove razitko pro to, co delam.
creator: peter.mlich

title: Issue with tab text going blurry when switching to a different window
content:
Hi,

So I got a new ultra-ultra wide 32:9 monitor and I noticed when I have firefox maximized on my new monitor and switch focus to a different window all of the text on tabs on the full screened firefox would go very blurry. If I had the same firefox windows full sized on my 16:9 secondary monitor this didn't happen. I then tried having the windows not maximized on the new monitor and it did not do this behavior when it was occupying what I would say was 1/3 of the screen width but if I stretched the screen too far it would again go back to this blurry behavior. So it seems like the text for the tabs behaves differently after the firefox window is stretched to a certain width. On the non-stretched firefox windows the letters simply get darker which I find to look better than the blurring. I added a screenshot that shows the differences I am seeing, the firefox window on the bottom screen shows the blurring, if you look at what would be the left middle side of the screenshot, while the top and bottom middle firefox windows show what it seems like it should look like.

Thanks, Dan
creator: dlb134

title: Bookmarks
content: I want to transfer all my bookmarks to another pc. I select export to HTML file and save to a flash drive. But no bookmarks ever appear anywhere that I can find. How can I get the bookmarks?
